metadata.title: Another Indian drone shot down by Pak Rangers

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, May 07 (APP):Pakistan Rangers shot down another Indian army drone in the Shakargarh sector. Security Sources said that the drone infiltration attempt was made in the morning but was shot down by Pakistan Rangers. Video Playerhttps://www.app.com.pk/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/WhatsApp-Video-2025-05-07-at-12.02.40.mp400:0000:0000:00Use Up/Down Arrow keys to increase or decrease volume. The Pak Armed Forces is effectively responding to every act of enemy aggression.
